sourcesContent:
import './App.css';
import { ChakraProvider, Flex, Input, Grid, Center, GridItem} from '@chakra-ui/react'
// import { ColorModeScript} from "@cha"
import NavBar from './components/navbar';
import { DataProvider } from "./context/DataContext";


function App() {
  return (
    <ChakraProvider>
      <DataProvider>
        <Flex w="100%" h="100svh"  justify="center" align="center">
          <Flex  maxW="480px" w="100%" maxH="896px" h="100%" direction="column" >
            <NavBar/>
            <Flex direction="column" justify="space-between" h="100%">
              <Flex h="25%" bg="red">

              </Flex>
              <Flex h="60%" bg="green">
                <Flex w="80%" bg="black">
                  <Grid templateColumns='repeat(3, 1fr)' w="100%" gap="1rem" p="1rem">
                    <Center bg="white">1</Center>
                    <Center bg="white">2</Center>
                    <Center bg="white">3</Center>
                    {/* <GridItem bg="white" h="100%" w="100%"/>
                    <GridItem bg="white" h="100%" w="100%"/>
                    <GridItem bg="white" h="100%" w="100%"/> */}
                    <Center bg="white">4</Center>
                    <Center bg="white">5</Center>
                    <Center bg="white">6</Center>
                    <Center bg="white">7</Center>
                    <Center bg="white">8</Center>
                    <Center bg="white">9</Center>
                    <Center bg="white">0</Center>
                    <Center bg="white">.</Center>
                    <Center bg="white">/</Center>
                  </Grid>
                </Flex>
                <Flex w="20%" bg="red">

                </Flex>
              </Flex>
            </Flex>
          </Flex>
        </Flex>
      </DataProvider>
    </ChakraProvider>
  );
}

export default App;
